typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_PostId} as long,
		{_Score} as long,
		{_Text} as string,
		{_UserDisplayName} as string,
		{_UserId} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcComment
source(output(
		{_Count} as long,
		{_ExcerptPostId} as long,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_TagName} as string,
		{_WikiPostId} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
SrcComment sink(input(
		IdComment as integer,
		PostId as integer,
		Score as integer,
		Text as string,
		UserDisplayName as string,
		UserId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> sink1
